dcterms:creator: J. Deng
W. Dong
R. Socher
L.-J. Li
K. Li
L. Fei-Fei
dcterms:description: ImageNet is a large scale and publicly available image database that offers more than 14 million images organized according to the WordNet hierarchy, aimed at providing a relevant database for visual recognition applications such as object recognition, image classification, or object localization.
dcterms:title: ImageNet

dcterms:creator: P. Salembier
T. Sikora
dcterms:description: MPEG-7 aims at describing multimedia content, such as image, audio, and video, providing a set of standardized visual descriptors to characterize multimedia content for efficient content-based retrieval.
dcterms:title: MPEG-7

dcterms:creator: B. S. Manjunath
J. R. Ohm
V. V. Vasudevan
A. Yamada
dcterms:description: Colour Layout Descriptor (CLD) is designed to capture the spatial distribution of dominant colours in an image, expressed in the YCbCr colour space, and is compact and resolution invariant.
dcterms:title: Colour Layout Descriptor (CLD)

dcterms:creator: C. S. Won
D. K. Park
Y. S. Jeon
dcterms:description: Edge Histogram Descriptor (EHD) captures the spatial distribution of five types of edges in an image, providing a texture descriptor based on the distribution of edges.
dcterms:title: Edge Histogram Descriptor (EHD)
